channel.title: Is there a way where my server can be up while I log out
channel.description: I there a way I can except for paying someone to host the server cuz I use my family's family computer and my parents get mad when I stay logged on...

item.title: Is there a way where my server can be up while I log out
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

[quote=“chassy13, post:2, topic:257640”]No, you can either buy a VPS or don’t log off your computer.[/quote]qft

Read full topic
